summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: C.O. Bigelow Shampoo, Lavender Peppermint Shampoo Cleanses & Soothes Hair & Scalp, Luxury Shampoo for Men & Women, 10.4 Fl Oz.
Review Date: 2020/01/04
Store: C. O. Bigelow
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'C. O. Bigelow', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Liquid,Gel', 'Scent': 'Fresh,Lavender,Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '815691009023'}
Review Text: This is a very good shampoo for everyday use. It has wonderful scent that keeps hair smelling great long after the shower, gets hair clean and moisturizes scalp well. I like using it.
Review Title: Love the scent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lip MOISTURIZER by MERLOTSPF15 - Intense Therapy Lip Moisturizer - Grape Seed Infused - for Healing Dry, Chapped Lips. Made with Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E - Color FreeSPF 15
Review Date: 2020/02/04
Store: Merlot
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '2.71 x 1.57 x 0.59 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
Review Text: This chapstick is tasteless and has no smell. Unlike many others, when applied it does not leave lips feeling greasy - it starts working right away. Lips are moist, supple, and it stays on for long periods of time. I like it. I have a bad habit of peeling my lips, and when this chapstick is on, I do not have the urge to do it.
Review Title: Good chapstick
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce
Review Date: 2020/04/13
Store: Bioré
Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'}
Review Text: The wipes come in a sealed like regular wipes package that goes inside little plastic container with a lid. The wipes have pleasant scent, remove make up really well from eye shadow to mist water that is pretty thick. It leaves skin clean and moisturized. I like using them. The size is enough to remove a good chunk of make up at one time.
Review Title: Good make up remover wipes
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ice Roller for Face & Eye by Charmlily, Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief - Cold Facial Massager Treatment to Reduce Puffy Face & Tighten Pores, Under Eye Wrinkles (Pink)
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: CHARMLILY
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CHARMLILY', 'Special Feature': 'Heat', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Not Water Resistant', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 3.54 x 2.48 inches; 6.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '679360098356', 'Manufacturer': 'CHARMLILY'}
Review Text: This roller is made out of lightweight plastic base and a a little sturdier roll that seems to be filled with some kind of gel. The roll is removable and needs to be put in the freezer for about 15-20 minutes. Then it's easily inserted back. It feels great on my face in the morning, wakes me right up and sort of revitalizes, plus I use it on my neck to close the pores. It works great with localized pain when you need something cold to bring  immediate relief. I must say it hold cold for a while, so one session will last however long you need. Good roller for pain relief and natural cosmetic treatments.
Review Title: Interesting way to self care
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bodyguard Moisturizing Immunity Soap 6pk | 7 Essential Oils Clinically Evaluated to Boost Immunity and Protect | Moisturizes with Sweet Almond Oil | Healthy PH for Skin Microbiome
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: Spa-Da
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Spa-Da', 'Scent': 'Cinnamon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 3.3 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '860003618998'}
Review Text: The soap came in a plastic bag. The bars are pretty small but they give off a nice scent. They lather well and do leave skin softer than after use of regular soap. The only problem is that you use it once, and it starts to disintegrate. It turns into mush that can be scooped up from the soap dish. Even if you completely dry it, it still disintegrates. I like using it but I wish it would keep its shape.
Review Title: Okay soap
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Claw Hair Clips, IKOCO 6 Pack Jaw Clips Stylish Matte Plastic Strong Hold Hair Clamps Box Packaged for Thin Fine Hair with 10Pcs Black Hair ties (2.4Inch)
Review Date: 2021/01/02
Store: IKOCO
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'IKOCO', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Color': 'Green,Grey', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal, Acrylic', 'Product Dimensions': '6.25 x 4.25 x 2 inches; 5.89 Ounces'}
Review Text: First day use, by the end of the day brown hair clip suddenly gave out. The loop that held the spring just broke while my daughter was resting. Not too sturdy. Next day we tried matte black clip, and it's holding steady but now I have to be gentle with it. The hair bands are a nice bonus as well as the storage box it all came with. So some of them are sturdy, some of them are flimsy. But they hold up hair well and tight.
Review Title: Hmmm
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Personal Care Focus**: Regular purchases in hair care, skin care, and lip care reflect a strong emphasis on grooming and self-maintenance.
  
2. **Preference for Scented Products**: Selection of items features appealing scents (lavender, peppermint, floral), indicating a preference for aromatic experiences.

3. **Natural Ingredients**: Tendency towards products free from harmful additives (e.g., paraben-free) suggests a preference for gentle, skin-friendly formulations.

4. **Moisturizing and Gentle Formulas**: Frequent purchases of moisturizing products (shampoos, lip moisturizers, cleansing jellies) indicate a preference for items that nourish and hydrate.

5. **Practical and Functional**: Reviews highlight practicality and effectiveness, with admiration for products that provide quick, noticeable results (e.g., instant relief and ease of use).

6. **Quality over Quantity**: Consistently high ratings suggest a prioritization of product quality, with a willingness to pay for effective, well-reviewed items.

7. **Diverse Care Techniques**: Interest in varied application techniques (ice roller, moisture soaps) points to a willingness to explore diverse methods of self-care.

8. **Mixed Experiences with Accessories**: While generally positive, experiences with accessories (hair clips) indicate a discerning eye for durability and functionality, revealing a desire for reliability in everyday tools.

Overall, the individual values quality, scent, hydration, and practicality in their product choices.

target_interaction.title: Good headbands
target_interaction.text: I got the headbands for my girls who are 5 and 10 years old. They fit them both nicely and are not too tight. The multitude of colors ensure they go with many different outfits. The headbands stay on and do not slide off. They are decently made.
target_interaction.title_meta: Nxconsu 12Pcs Headbands for Women Girls Teens Elastic Hair Bands Silky Solid Colors Pleated Crinkle Head Band Fashion Trendy Outfit Colorful Thin Comfortable Hair Accessories for Home Work Gym Casual
